intro: Creaghia, commonly known as the velvetleaf, is a tropical plant belonging to the family Malvaceae. It is characterized by its large, heart-shaped leaves that are covered in fine, velvety hairs, giving it a distinctive texture. Creaghia is often found in disturbed habitats and can become invasive in certain regions.
